trends: There have been no other sightings in Harris
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsReturning from a movie, suddenly everything became bright even the interior of the car. I stopped & the light went out. My first thought was a chopper with a light on it but I looked out the window couldn't see or hear anything. Got out & looked & listened......nothing. My wife & I talked about it & she said when we get home to call the Sherif. I did that & filled out a report over the phone. I also asked if anyone else had reported anything and told he couldn't give out any info.
